strings.string:
Possible values and correspondation:
Code Name Description Extra* Extra2*
1 Telehub - -
2 PgEvent PG rated event - See `ContentRating`.
3 MatureEvent Mature rated event - See `ContentRating`.
4 Popular Popular location
6 AgentLocations Locations of avatar groups in a region Avatar count -
7 LandForSale Size of region. Price of region.
8 Classified Classified ad
9 AdultEvent Adult rated event - See `ContentRating`.
10 AdultLandForSale Size of region. Price of region.
*: only relevant for reply. ContentRating: - 0: Event is PG rated. - 1: Event is Mature rated. - 2: Event is Adult rated.
